name: cypress-cucumber-boilerplate
description: This project is meant to be a kind of template to start working with Cucumber and Cypress just cloning the project.

scripts.cypress:execution-allure: cypress run --env allure=true --config videosFolder=cypress/videos --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/screenshots --config integrationFolder=cypress/e2e --config baseUrl=https://www.saucedemo.com --config reportDir=allure-results-{random}
scripts.allure:clear: rmdir /s /q allure-results allure-report cypress\screenshots > nul 2>&1 || echo.
scripts.allure:history: move /y allure-report\history allure-results\history && rmdir /s /q allure-report > nul 2>&1 || echo.
scripts.generate:report: npm run allure:clear && npm run cypress:execution-allure && npm run allure:report
scripts.calculate:pass-percentage: node -e "const results = require('./allure-results/data/test-cases.json'); const passedTests = results.filter(test => test.status === 'passed'); const passPercentage = (passedTests.length / results.length) * 100; console.log('Pass Percentage:', passPercentage.toFixed(2));"

author: cucumber
